content: May GOD Bless Paul Harvey and his family. I trusted his comments, there are non-other (my view) to replace him on the Moral Highground...

content: Thank you Mr Harvey for many years of news, entertainment and "The Rest of the Story"! RIP sir, you deserve it!

title: RIP Paul Harvey

content: Rest in peace Mr Harvey. He lived like he spoke, honest and true to the one who he called "Angel", his wife. They have finally reunited. Good Daaaaaaay!
